songs.title: Girl What’s Up (Remix)
songs.lyrics:
[Verse 1: Usher]
What's your name?
Baby, what's your number?
Cause girl you got me
You got a brother wondering
If you wanna, meet me in the lover
I can be your friend till the end

[Chorus: Usher]
Now, girl what's up?
I'm going crazy
Aye girl what's up?
Cause I wanna know if I can love ya
Yo girl what's up?
Yo won't ya be my lady ah?
Yeah girl what's up?
I wanna know who you are
What's your name?
I wanna know who you are
What's your name?
I wanna know who you are and make you a star
Girl, I'm giving you everything cause my love is yours

[Verse 2: XV]
Vizzy Vizzy cocoa pop
I bet your bitty know I'm hot
Bet you fit it, I'm gonna pop
Holy moly, getting gwap
L-l-l-let's chop it up
Here's my number, lock it up
My name's XV, yes that's me
Now you see why everyone was watching us

[Chorus: Usher]

[Verse 3: Usher]
What's your name?
Yeah baby, what's your number?
Cause girl you got me
You got a brother wondering
If you want a, homie and a lover
Cause I can be your friend 'til the end

Would it, shouldn't be a problem
If a holla
Como se llama
Would ya bother?
Like Donna Summers
Girl give me this last dance
So we soul escapin' babe
Don't wanna float away
Cause we got the light
You be the ball and I'ma be the chain gang
Booty (round and round and round)
You got no where to go babe
(Girl I didn't get your name)
Illuminate and create a new thang
(Pop pop pop pop)
Let em paparazzi this you and me thang
But we can't do a thing til I know your name

[Chorus: Usher]

[Verse 4: XV]
Welllll
My name's X Vizzy but the chicky's call me X
And if your girl friend met me now you probably call her "Ex"
Show me the bus cause MTV said I was next
Generally 'bout my meals, yeah I still get the checks
So I fly to Tokyo, 12 hours on the jet
With a fresh Japanese chick that I just met
Bow gracefully just to show my respect
Then said, {Japanese}

[Outro: Usher]
What's your name?
{Japanese}
What's your name?
{Japanese}
I wanna know who you are and make you a star
Girl, I'm giving you everything cause my love is yours
